title: SCP-5057 Additional Documentation
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:scp-pride]]
[[module css]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Reenie+Beanie');

.footnotes-footer { 
display:none;
}

.page {
    display: block;
    overflow: hidden;
    font-family: "Monotype Corsiva", "Bradley Hand ITC", sans-serif;
    font-style: normal;

   
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-clip: border-box;
    background-color: transparent;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to top ,rgb(202, 219, 228) 0%, rgb(231, 233, 220) 8%);
    background-origin: padding-box;
    background-position: 0px 8px;
    background-repeat: repeat;
    background-size: 100% 20px;
    

    border: 1px solid #CCC;
    border-radius: 10px;
    padding: 10px 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;

    box-shadow: 0px 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)
    }
.page p {
    line-height: 20px;
    margin: 0;
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

**Addendum 5057.3** SCP-5057 was successfully transferred to the recently formed Professor Funtastic Researcher Team lead by Dr. Cole. The following interviews/interactions were recorded by Dr. Cole and the GoI-563[[footnote]]Professor Funtastic.[[/footnote]] research team.
@@ @@
@@ @@


[[div style="background: url(http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-great-hippo/SCP_icon%281%29.png) top right no-repeat; float: center; border: solid 3px #444444; width: 85%; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[table style="align:left; margin-top: 10px;"]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="text-align:right"]]
**From:**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
##red|@@hcole@scp.int@@##
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="text-align:right"]]
**To:**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
##red|@@jeverwood@scp.int@@##
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="text-align:right"]]
**Subject:**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
SCP-5057
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
-----
Hello,

Sorry to bother you; I know you are very busy but I had an inquiry about SCP-5057 and its time spent under your care. In your assistant's notes it says it is very chatty and childlike, but when we spoke it gave one-word answers and shooed me out of its containment chamber. 

Did something happen to it that wasn't documented while it was under your care?

Thanks in advance.

----

Dr. H. Cole
GoI-563 Research Lead
Secure, Contain, Protect
[[/div]]
[[div style="background: url(http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-great-hippo/SCP_icon%281%29.png) top right no-repeat; float: center; border: solid 3px #444444; width: 85%; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[table style="align:left; margin-top: 10px;"]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="text-align:right"]]
**From:**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
##red|@@jeverwood@scp.int@@##
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="text-align:right"]]
**To:**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
##red|@@hcole@scp.int@@##
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="text-align:right"]]
**Subject:**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
RE:SCP-5057
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
-----
Harry,

I did not personally interact with SCP-5057 while it was assigned to my department. My assistant Rex Alces was in charge of it. I will ask him shortly.

Regards,
----

Dr. J. Everwood
GoI-466 Research Lead
Secure, Contain, Protect
[[/div]]
> 
> **<BEGIN LOG>**
> 
> **Cole:** Hello, fifty-fifty-seven. I see you are painting again. 
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Art is purpose. Takes mind off toxicity.
> 
> **Cole:** Well, I'm glad you've got something to help improve your mental state. And speaking of your mental state, that's why I'm here. I wanted to check in on you and see how you were doing.
> 
> //[SCP-5057 stops painting and turns to face Dr. Cole.]//
> 
> **SCP-5057:** I is feeling toxic. I cannot be eaten by the good little boys and girls because I am toxic. So I make art. But art is not enough. So I make more art.
> 
> **Cole:** Yeah, I can see you've been busy.
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Yeah. Does you needing anything else? Should not be speaking to me because I am toxic to eat and be talking to.
> 
> **Cole:** What do you mean you're toxic to be spoken to?
> 
> **SCP-5057:** I is make friend but friend become mean and no longer friend.
> 
> **Cole:** I'm not sure I fully understand what you mean.
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Is because I am stupid little plastic failure of child product.
> 
> **Cole:** What? Where did you get that from?
> 
> //[There is a five second silence. SCP-5057 turns around and continues painting on its canvas.]// 
> 
> **Cole:** What did you mean by that?
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Please do not be of talking to me. I am toxic to eat and be talking to.
> 
> //[Dr. Cole approaches SCP-5057 and inspects the canvas it is working on.]//
> 
> **Cole:** Hmm. Okay. I think I get it now. I'll be back later, fifty-fifty-seven.
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Okay.
[[div style="background: url(http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-great-hippo/SCP_icon%281%29.png) top right no-repeat; float: center; border: solid 3px #444444; width: 85%; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[table style="align:left; margin-top: 10px;"]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="text-align:right"]]
**From:**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
##red|@@jeverwood@scp.int@@##
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="text-align:right"]]
**To:**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
##red|@@hcole@scp.int@@##
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="text-align:right"]]
**Subject:**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
RE:SCP-5057
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
-----
Harry,

I checked with my assistant and he says nothing out of the norm occurred to SCP-5057 during its time here. Sorry we could not be of further assistance to your research.

Regards,
----

Dr. J. Everwood
GoI-466 Research Lead
Secure, Contain, Protect
[[/div]]


[[div style="background: url(http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-great-hippo/SCP_icon%281%29.png) top right no-repeat; float: center; border: solid 3px #444444; width: 85%; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[table style="align:left; margin-top: 10px;"]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="text-align:right"]]
**From:**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
##red|@@hcole@scp.int@@##
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="text-align:right"]]
**To:**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
##red|@@jeverwood@scp.int@@##
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="text-align:right"]]
**Subject:**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
SCP-5057
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
-----
Hello,

I believe you should question your assistant again regarding the attached document.


[[image smudge.jpg]]



Thanks in advance.
----

Dr. H. Cole
GoI-563 Research Lead
Secure, Contain, Protect
[[/div]]
> 
> **<BEGIN LOG>**
> 
> **Cole:** Hi, fifty-fifty-seven. How are you feeling?
> 
> **SCP-5057:** The same.
> 
> **Cole:** I'm sorry you're not feeling well, but I'd like to talk to you about what happened.
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Okay.
> 
> **Cole:** Researcher Rex, how did he treat you?
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Rex was friend. Yeah. Good friend.
> 
> **Cole:** Then why did you do that to the portrait of you two?
> 
> //[Dr. Cole points to the portrait of Researcher Rex and SCP-5057.]//
> 
> **SCP-5057:** I am not wanting to talk about it.
> 
> **Cole:** Was he cruel to you?
> 
> **SCP-5057:** What is cruel?
> 
> **Cole:** Hmm. Being cruel is like being really mean and unfriendly to someone.
> 
> //[There is a ten-second silence.]//
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Yes. He was of being cruel.
> 
> **Cole:** What did he do?
> 
> **SCP-5057:** He made me feel toxic.
> 
> **Cole:** I see. For what it's worth, I don't think you're toxic to talk to, fifty-fifty-seven.
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Really?
> 
> **Cole:** Yeah. You seem like an alright person who was mistreated and led to believe something that isn't true. 
> 
> **SCP-5057:** But I am still toxic.
> 
> **Cole:** You may be toxic to eat, but you are not a toxic person. If anything, I believe Researcher Rex is the real toxic person here.
> 
> **SCP-5057:** I am... not toxic?
> 
> **Cole:** No. You're you. And that's perfectly fine. You know, a real friend wouldn't make you feel toxic. A real friend cares about what you have to say and actually listens to you.
> 
> **SCP-5057:** I am me... I am not knowing of what to say.
> 
> **Cole:** You don't need to say anything. Why don't you go ahead and paint something new? I have to get in contact with someone about something.
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Okay!
> 
> **<END LOG>**
[[div style="background: url(http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-great-hippo/SCP_icon%281%29.png) top right no-repeat; float: center; border: solid 3px #444444; width: 85%; padding: 1px 15px; margin: auto; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
[[table style="align:left; margin-top: 10px;"]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="text-align:right"]]
**From:**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
##red|@@jeverwood@scp.int@@##
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="text-align:right"]]
**To:**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
##red|@@hcole@scp.int@@##
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="text-align:right"]]
**Subject:**
[[/hcell]]
[[cell]]
RE:SCP-5057
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
-----
Harry,

My assistant said he is familiar with the portrait but reports no unusual events surrounding it. However, he seemed rather uncomfortable about the situation and appeared apprehensive to answer. Therefore I will be personally combing through the logs of all recorded interactions between SCP-5057 and my assistant. I will report any findings to you.

Regards,
----

Dr. J. Everwood
GoI-466 Research Lead
Secure, Contain, Protect
[[/div]]

> 
> **<BEGIN LOG>**
> 
> **Cole:** Hello, fifty-fifty-seven.
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Hello! I am of feeling very very good.
> 
> **Cole:** That's great! What turned your mood around?
> 
> **SCP-5057:** I spend time wondering 'what if I is make people toxic?' But you are say I am not toxic, only to eat. I am perfectly fine you say! So I spend time wondering 'what if what Doctor Cole are say is right?' And then I feel good. I have not feel good since Rex was friend.
> 
> **Cole:** Heh. I'm glad you're feeling better then. By the way, I think you'll be receiving something from your old 'friend' Rex.
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Why is?
> 
> **Cole:** Just call it a hunch.
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Okay, I is calling it hunch. 
> 
> **Cole:** So do you want to show me what you painted today?
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Yes! Behold!
> 
> //[SCP-5054 steps towards a canvas towards the back of its containment chamber and returns with with it, handing it to Dr. Cole.]//
> 
> **Cole:** Very nice. Are you done with it? 
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Yes.
> 
> **Cole:** Perfect. Why don't I hang it up for you?
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Yes!
> 
> //[Dr. Cole proceeds to place the canvas on the wall, hung by a present nail.]//
> 
> **Cole:** There we go. So, now that we've got that out of the way, why don't we talk a little about Professor Funtastic? 
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Okay, but I ask one thing.
> 
> **Cole:** What is it?
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Can you be of calling me 'Taste'?
> 
> **Cole:** Anything you want, Taste.
> 
> **SCP-5057:** Okay. I be telling you everything I know now.
> 
> **<END LOG>**
> 
> //**Note:** SCP-5057 was questioned for 2 hours following this interaction but was unable to provide any information on Professor Funtastic. Further research is currently pending.//
[[include component:image-block name=perfectlyfine.jpg|caption=Portrait produced by SCP-5057.|width=300px]]

[[div class="page"]]
[[size 125%]]Dear SCP-5057,
@@ @@
I am sorry. I shouldn't have treated you the way I did. That wasn't very friend-like of me and I sincerely hope you're being treated better wherever you are now.
@@ @@
- Rex.[[/size]]
[[/div]]
